plugins.name: themeLoader
plugins.description: Installed by default with GCE. This plugin allow you to add custom CSS theme to Chat.

plugins.name: superNotification
plugins.description: This plugin allows you to have notifications as long as you have not read the message received from the person desired.

plugins.name: customoji
plugins.description: Add custom emoji/gifs to google chat! drag and drop your image to publish it.
